price: 13 puis sa descendance d’un liquide insignifiant placé dans un réceptacle sûr[889].
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
